title: As a user I want to be able to search for a CSP Player Summary
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in  Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL

AND navigates to the Advanced Search by clicking the magnify button on top of page
AND user sees "CSP/CEP Player Summary" in the "Search for" drop down
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects CSP/CEP Player Summary from the Search for dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN

* user will see the following drop down filter options 
   Player First Name
   Player Last Name
   Responsible Organization Name
   Roster Name
   Status

AND

* If user enters information based on filter selected and conducts an advanced search it will return the correct columns and the correct results set based on the filters selected. The following columns will be shown by default
   Player Name
   Roster Name
   Responsible Org
   Date of Birth
   Status

title: As a user I want the CSP Summary tab on a professional player profile to look different based on the Signing Date of the player's CSP Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL
AND the user has a signed CSP Contract

Players who signed after 1/12/2005:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp

Players who signed after 10/3/2004 and before 1/12/2005:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp

Players who signed on or before 10/3/2004:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_legacy_-_before_10_3_2004

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+Summary
custom_steps:
WHEN searching for a player who signed after 1/12/2005 by 
Clicking the magnifying glass button on top of page takes you to Advanced Search
AND select Minor Contract in the Search For drop down
AND select Signing Date / After for the filter
AND enter in 01/12/2005
AND click the add filter link to add another row
AND select Addendum B Clause / is for the next filter
AND select College Scholarship
AND click Search button
AND clicking on a player in the results and viewing the player's profile page 
example player who signed after 1/12/2005 - https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/history?playerId=773313 (Dom Abbadessa)


WHEN searching for a player who signed after 10/03/2004 and before 1/12/2005  
Clicking the magnifying glass button on top of page takes you to Advanced Search
AND select Minor Contract in the Search For drop down
AND select Signing Date / between for the filter
AND enter in the following dates 10/03/2004 and before 1/12/2005
AND click the add filter link to add another row
AND select Addendum B Clause / is for the next filter
AND select College Scholarship
AND click Search button
AND clicking on a player in the results and viewing the player's profile page 
example player who signed between 10/03/2004 and 1/12/2005 - https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/history?playerId=305362  (Miguel Gonzalez)

WHEN searching for a player who signed before 10/3/2004  
Clicking the magnifying glass button on top of page takes you to Advanced Search
AND select Minor Contract in the Search For drop down
AND select Signing Date / before for the filter
AND enter in 10/3/2004
AND click the add filter link to add another row
AND select Addendum B Clause / is for the next filter
AND select College Scholarship
AND click Search button
AND clicking on a player in the results and viewing the player's profile page 
example player who signed before 10/03/2004 - https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/history?playerId=85999 (Jeff Abbott)


Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+Summary
custom_expected:
THEN

* The CSP Summary tab should look different for players based on the CSP that they signed under. This distinction is driven by the Signing Date of the contract which contained a CSP clause for them.

* For players who signed after 1/12/2005, the CSP Summary should match the provided wireframe and the "Taxable Amount and Living Allowance/Tuition Allowance and Taxable Amount" data discovery (both on the same page in the requirements).

   Info Section should also have the following fields (Status, Responsible Org, Signing date, Tuition Allowance Completed, Living Allowance Completed, Date Lapsed)
   Commitment Section should have detailed info for the following sub-sections (Tuition Allowance, Living Allowance)
   Used Section should have detailed info for the following sub-sections (Tuition Allowance, Living Allowance)
   Remaining Section should have detailed info for the following sub-sections (Tuition Allowance, Living Allowance)
   Comments Section
   Payment History Section

*  For players who signed after 10/3/2004 and before 1/12/2005, the CSP Summary should match the provided wireframe and the "Taxable Amount and Living Allowance/Tuition Allowance and Taxable Amount" data discovery (both on the same page in the requirements), with the exception of "Net Amount" in the Payment History. 

   Info Section should also have the following fields (Status, Responsible Org, Signing date, Tuition Allowance Completed, Living Allowance Completed, Date Lapsed)
   Commitment Section should have detailed info for the following sub-sections (Tuition Allowance, Living Allowance)
   Used Section should have detailed info for the following sub-sections (Tuition Allowance, Living Allowance)
   Remaining Section should have detailed info for the following sub-sections (Tuition Allowance, Living Allowance)
   Comments Section
   Payment History Section
 
* For players who signed on or before 10/3/2004, the CSP Summary should match the provided wireframe and the "Original" data discovery. 

   Info Section should also have the following fields (Status, Responsible Org, Signing date, Date Completed, Date Lapsed)
   Summary Section should have detailed info for the following sub-sections (Commitment, Used, Remaining)
   Comments Section
   Payment History Section

title: As a user I want to be able to edit the CSP Summary on a professional player profile (Post 10/3/04)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as user  Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL
AND User is on Players CSP Tab

To Locate a CSP Player
Click CSP/CEP menu on left side nav bar
Select Players sub nav
Click the Signing Date column header to sort the signing date in descending order
Click on a player name link who has a signing date after 10/03/2004 and shows CSP in the Type column
The above selection will take you to the players CSP Summary page
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking the Edit button it puts the Summary page into edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN

* A Save button, Print Letter drop down button and a cancel button are available in Edit mode.
* Clicking "Save" will conduct a required field and formatting check according to the data discovery. 
* Once the required field check has passed, the changes will be saved and a blue successful save notification will be displayed. The page will reload in View mode. 
* Any changes that were made to the Payment History are reflected in the associated Invoice.
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they are sure that they wish to lose any changes. If they confirm, the form is put back in view mode and no changes are saved. If they do not confirm, the modal is closed and they are returned to the form in edit mode with their changes still present.

title: As a user I want to be able to search for a CSP Invoice
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in test_boc_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks the magnifying glass at the top of the page
AND user is on the Advanced Search page and CSP/CEP Invoice is an option in the Search For dropdown
AND user specifies a CSP/CEP Invoice Status parameter (Canceled, Open, Paid) and clicks Search
custom_expected:
THEN

* Selecting this will load the following filters. 

   CSP/CEP Invoice Status (sub dropdown - Canceled, Open, Paid)
   CSP/CEP Status (sub dropdown - Completed, Current, Current Living Allowance Only, Current Tuition Allowance Only, Lapsed)
   Player First Name
   Player Last Name
   Responsible Organization Name

* Conducting an advanced search will return the following columns by default

   Player Name
   Responsible Org
   Payee
   Created
   Total Amount
   Status

title: As a user I want to be able to save a new CSP invoice (Pre 10/3/2004)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL
AND you are viewing a CSP Invoice for a player who signed before 10/03/2004 in edit mode and there is a "Save" button. 

example player:  https://ebisbf.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=123664 (Neal Blaine)
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the invoice in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN

* You will see a Save button
* AND clicking Save will run a required field and formatting check 
* AND the Created and Created By fields are set accordingly. 
* AND A blue successful save notification is displayed. 
* AND the Invoice appears in the player's Payment History on the Summary tab. 
* AND any updates made to the CSP Status, Date Lapsed, or Date Completed fields are reflected on the player's CSP Summary.

title: As a user I want to see Tuition Allowance Credits and Living Allowance Credits split out separately for invoices for CSP's post 10/3/04
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in Test-SF-admin@mlb.com	/ beat~FEEL
AND User is on Players CSP Tab where player has signed post 10/03/2004

example player invoice:  https://ebisbf.mlb.com/ebisui/#/csp-invoice?playerId=356974&invoiceId=127335

http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=invoice
custom_steps: WHEN User clicks on an Invoice for a CSP with a Signing Date after 10/3/2004
custom_expected:
THEN

*  There are now going to be 2 separate Credit fields (Tuition Credits and Living Expense Credits)

title: As a user I want to see an error when I enter a Total Amount equal to 0
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in 	Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL
AND user is viewing the CSP Summary page of a player 
AND user has invoices in their payment history (at bottom of CSP Summary page)

example player:  https://ebisbf.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=234672  (David Aardsma)
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on one of the links under the Term column (Payment History section), user is taken to the Invoice page
AND user click the edit button at the bottom of the invoice page and blanks out totals for Living Expenses, Tuition, Books, Fees so that the Total Net Amount equals  0 on invoice 
AND user clicks Save button
custom_expected:
THEN

Error message appears "Payment total must be greater than 0"
Back button will be available and will return user to point of entry

title: As a user I want to see an error when I enter a Net Amount equal to 0
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in   Test-SF-admin@mlb.com  /  beat~FEEL
AND user navigates to the CSP Summary page of a player that has Invoices with status "Paid"
AND user clicks the link for the Paid invoice under Term column
AND user will be taken to the Invoice page

example player - https://ebisstg.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/history?playerId=357924 (Tyler Beede)
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the Edit Button
AND user enters 0 in the Total Net Amount field
AND clicks the Save button
custom_expected:
THEN

* The following message should display " Net Amount must be greater than 0 for Paid Invoices
* Back button will display on this error message which will return user to point of entry

title: As a user I want to be able to view an existing CSP credit (Post 10/3/04)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in test_boc_approver@mlb.com	/ pass@HEARD
AND user has signing date after 10/3/2004 and has Payment History information

Player ID ex:  https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=353425 (Cameron Coffey)

Wireframe: 
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=credit

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+Credit
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to the CSP tab of a player and scrolls to the bottom where it shows Payment History
AND clicks the term link for a Credit (shows CREDIT in Paid To column)
custom_expected:
THEN

* The player's Payment History for a credit should launch the Credit for the user. 
* If the Credit is for a player whose CSP signing date is after 10/3/2004, then the system will display the Credit according to the wireframe and data discovery. 
   Academic Period Section (Year, Period, Semester/Quarter, Living Expense Credits, Tuition Credits)
   Status & Dates Section (Credit Issued, Issued By, Last Changed, Last Changed By)
   Payment Details Section (Start Date, End Date, Living Expenses, Tuition, Books, Fees, Total)
   Comments Section
* The CSP Summary at the top of the Credit is collapsed by default and should be directly tied to the current information on the player's CSP tab (Not a snapshot).

title: As a user I want to be able to create a new CSP credit (Post 10/3/04)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in test_boc_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
AND user navigates to the CSP/CEP Players page (left side tab option)
AND user selects a player who has a CSP and shows a signing after 10/3/2004 
AND player shows they have amounts remaining and used in their CSP (Remaining and Used columns)


ex player:  https://ebisbf.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=384460 (Spencer Adams)

Wireframe: 
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=credit

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+Credit
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks navigates to the players CSP Summary Page by clicking on the player name 
AND selecting CSP from top right drop down ... 
AND user scrolls down to Payment History and sees existing Invoices
AND user clicks New Credit
AND enters the same Amount that is on the Invoice for either Tuition and/or Living Allowance
AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN

Clicking SAVE will run a required field and formatting check according to the provided data discovery.
Once the required field and formatting check and any other rule checks (covered in other stories) have passed, the form is saved.
The Credit Issued and Issued By fields are set accordingly.
A blue successful save notification is displayed.
The Credit appears in the player's Payment History on the Summary tab.
Any updates made to the Remaining and Used amounts are reflected on the player's CSP Summary.
The credit will add back the dollar Amount entered to the Remaining total and subtract from the Used total
Any updates made to the CSP Status, Date Lapsed, or Date Completed fields are reflected on the player's CSP Summary.

title: As a user I want to be able to save a new CSP credit (Post 10/3/2004)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in test_boc_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
AND player has an existing CSP Credit in their Payment History

ex: player  https://ebisbf.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=363576 (Theo Alexander)

AND user navigates to the CSP/CEP Players page (left side tab option)
AND user selects a player who has a CSP and shows a signing after 10/3/2004
AND player shows they have amounts remaining and used in their CSP (Remaining and Used columns)


Wireframe: 
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=credit

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+Credit
custom_steps:
WHEN user is viewing a credit in edit mode and clicks the Save button

WHEN user clicks navigates to the players CSP Summary Page by clicking on the player name
AND selecting CSP from top right drop down ...
AND user scrolls down to Payment History and sees an existing Credit
AND user clicks the link under Terms column for the Credit and enters the credit page
AND user clicks the Edit button at the bottom of the page
AND user edits any of the fields on the credit
AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN

* Once the required field and formatting check and any other rule checks (covered in other stories) have passed, the form is saved. 
* The Credit Issued and Issued By fields are updated and set accordingly. 
* A blue Credit Saved Successfully notification is displayed. 
* The Credit appears in the player's Payment History on the Summary tab. 
* The credit will add back the dollar Amount entered to the Remaining total and subtract from the Used total
* Any updates made to the CSP Status, Date Lapsed, Tuition Allowance Completed or Living Allowance Completed fields are reflected on the player's CSP Summary.

title: As a user I want to be able to save a new CSP credit (Post 10/3/2004)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has signed after 10/3/2004 and user has a CSP
AND player has an Invoice for a given academic Period

ex:  https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=348624


Wireframe: 
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=credit

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+Credit
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks New Credit on the CSP tab of a profile
AND enters the same academic Period as the one on the Invoice
AND fills in required fields
AND enters the same Amount that is on the Invoice for either Tuition and/or Living Allowance
AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN

* Clicking this button will run a required field and formatting check 
* Once the required field and formatting check and any other rule checks (covered in other stories) have passed, the form is saved. 
* The Credit Issued and Issued By fields are set accordingly. 
* A blue successful save notification is displayed. 
* The Credit appears in the player's Payment History on the Summary tab.
* Any updates made to the Remaining and Used amounts are reflected on the player's CSP Summary.
* The credit will add back the dollar Amount entered to the Remaining total and subtract from the Used total
* Any updates made to the CSP Status, Date Lapsed, or Date Completed fields are reflected on the player's CSP Summary.
 
* The Credit appears in the player's Payment History on the Summary tab. 
* Any updates made to the CSP Status, Date Lapsed, Tuition Allowance Completed or Living Allowance Completed fields are reflected on the player's CSP Summary.

title: As a user I want to see Tuition Allowance Credits and Living Allowance Credits split out separately for credits for CSP's post 10/3/04
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is on Players CSP Tab for a player who signed after 10/3/2004
AND user has a CSP with Tuition and Living amounts
AND user has invoices in their history

Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL

ex:  https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=357295 (Jordan Akins)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user clicks New Credit on the CSP tab of a profile
AND enters the same academic Period as the one on the Invoice
AND fills in required fields
AND enters the same Amount or less that is on the Invoice for either Tuition or Living Allowance
AND clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN

* When viewing the CSP Summary page there are now going to be 2 separate Credit fields (Tuition Credits and Living Expenses Credits).
* The Used Living and Tuition Allowance Totals should decrease the dollar amount of the credit you entered
* The Remaining Living and Tuition Allowance Balance should Increase the same dollar amount of the credit you entered

title: As a user I want to be able to delete a CSP credit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a User is logged in test_boc_approver@mlb.com 
AND on Players CSP Tab who currently has a Credit in their payment history

ex: https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/csp?playerId=344752 (Jason Thompson)
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to the Payment History of player and clicks on the Term link for a Credit that was issued
AND user is on Credit page and scrolls down to see Delete button
AND user clicks the Delete button
custom_expected:
THEN

* Clicking "Delete" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to confirm the deletion of the item. See Messages #22. 
* Confirming that they wish to delete will permanently delete the credit from the system and return the user to the point of entry and throw a blue notification saying "CSP Credit successfully deleted"
* Clicking No will dismiss the modal.

title: As a user I want to be able to search for a CSP School
custom_preconds:
GIVEN CSP/CEP School" is an option in the "Search for" dropdown. 

test_boc_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD


Search Requirements: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Search+-+CSP+Schools
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the Advanced Search icon (magnifying glass) at top of page and navigates to the advanced search page
AND user selects CSP/CEP School from the drop down
AND user enters filter information and clicks the Search button (School City, School Name, School State)
custom_expected:
THEN 

* This will load the relevant filters according to the provided search requirements. 
* AND Conducting an advanced search will return the correct columns and the correct results set based on the filters selected.

Each Filter will show the following result columns:

School Name
City
State
Type
Contact Name

title: As a user I want to be able to view an existing CSP school profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN CSP/CEP School is a drop down search term on Advanced Search page
Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL

Wireframe: 
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_school_profile
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the Advanced Search icon (magnifying glass) at top of page and navigates to the advanced search page
AND user selects CSP/CEP School from the drop down
AND user enters filter information and clicks the Search button (School City, School Name, School State)
AND clicks on a School Name link from Results
custom_expected:
THEN
 
* Clicking on the School Name in advanced search results will open the school profile.  
* The school profile will follow the format and layout of the wireframe.

School Information will show:
Name
Type
Contact
Phone
Approved For

Address will show:
School Address


Edit, Delete and Close button will be visible

title: As a user I want to be edit an existing CSP School Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on Players CSP school profile 
Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL

Wireframe:
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=csp_school_profile

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+CSP+School
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks the Advanced Search icon (magnifying glass) at top of page and navigates to the advanced search page
AND user selects CSP/CEP School from the drop down
AND user enters filter information and clicks the Search button (School City, School Name, School State)
AND clicks on a School Name link from Results
AND when user is viewing an existing CSP School profile and clicks the Edit button
custom_expected:
THEN

* View mode should have "Edit, Delete and Close" Button 
* Clicking "Close" will close the profile and return the user to the point of entry.
* Clicking "Edit" will reload the profile in edit mode.
* In Edit Mode there will be a "Delete, Save and Cancel" button
* Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to lose changes. If they confirm, the form will reload in View mode with none of the changes saved. If they do not confirm, the modal will close and the form will remain in Edit mode with the changes still in place. 
* Clicking "Save" will run a required field and format check.
* Once the required field/format check has passed, the form will be saved and reloaded in View mode. 
* A successful blue save notification will display.

title: School - Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in  as admin Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL (admin)   Test-SF-viewer@mlb.com / village;ENTIRE (viewer)
AND on CSP/CEP Schools tab
custom_steps:
WHEN User click on CSP/CEP from left side Nav
AND selects Schools 
AND selects a school on the CSP/CEP Schools page
custom_expected:
THEN

*This form should share permissions with the CSP Summary - no new LDAP should be created*
* The form has a view only permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view all aspects of the form, but cannot edit anything.  Users without the permission cannot view the form anywhere in the system.csp
* The form has an edit permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view and edit CSP Schools. Users without the permission cannot edit CSP Schools anywhere in the system.

title: Credit - Permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as admin  Test-SF-admin@mlb.com / beat~FEEL (admin) or viewer Test-SF-viewer@mlb.com / village;ENTIRE (viewer)
AND on Players CSP Tab
AND user has a CSP Credit in their payment history

ex player https://ebisdev.mlb.com/ebisui/#/pro-player-profile/history?playerId=356974 (Allen Brandon)
custom_steps: WHEN User Click on CSP Summary
custom_expected:
THEN

*This form should share permissions with the CSP Summary - no new LDAP should be created*
* The form has a view only permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view all aspects of the form, but cannot edit anything.  Users without the permission cannot view the form anywhere in the system.
* The form has an edit permission set that can be added to an existing user if needed. Users with this permission can view and edit CSP Credits. Users without the permission cannot edit CSP Credits anywhere in the system.

title: Invoice - Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in and is on a CSP summary page of a player with a Payment History
custom_steps:
WHEN I view an invoice as a view-only account  Test-SF-viewer@mlb.com / village;ENTIRE 

WHEN I view an invoice as a boc account   test_boc_approver@mlb.com / pass@HEARD
custom_expected:
THEN

* I can see the invoice and print but not edit
* I can see, print and edit the invoice

title: Summary - Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a CSP
custom_steps:
WHEN 

I view a CSP summary as the view-only account (ex:  Test-SF-viewer@mlb.com / village;ENTIRE)

I view a CSP summary as a boc account (ex:  test_boc_approver@mlb.com  /  pass@HEARD)
custom_expected:
THEN 

* I can view and print from the summary
* I can view, print and edit the summary
